page.title: 12Transport
page.content: Solihull is served by the West Midlands Passenger Transport Executive which provides routes passing through and terminating there. Regular services go all through our block linking with Birmingham, Coventry, all local villages and stations. The trains at Solihull station are timed to provide a connection with the bus service. The station is not very busy. Most of the trains are local, going from Birmingham to Stratford. Close by is the main line station Birmingham International on the National Exhibition Centre site. Trains to London Euston can be caught here. There too is Birmingham Airport. The M42 and M6 motorways are also near and when the M42 is completed soon these motorways will be connected to the M1 and M4.
